document.heading: Fiscal Year 1998 Revised Budget Support Temporary Act of 1997

history.narrative: Law 12-59, the “Fiscal Year 1998 Revised Budget Support Temporary Act of 1997,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 12-350. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on September 8, 1997, and September 22, 1997, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on October 24, 1997, it was assigned Act No. 12-190 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 12-59 became effective on March 20, 1998.
